description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
flavorText: “Unearthly light flooded the valley as a piercing wail rattled the rocks from the cliffs, my sinews from their bones, the very thoughts from my mind! Then... silence.” - Bjerg the Wanderer
name: Balesight
